channel.title: Directories on Clockwork
channel.description: Recent content in Directories on Clockwork

item.title: Albert Latacz
item.description: Albert is a seasoned engineering lead with extensive experience in delivering high-quality software systems across various industries. He specializes in lean and incremental development approaches, emphasizing pragmatic programming principles and value delivery without compromising on quality. Albert has a proven track record in leading complex system migrations, re-architecting platforms, and driving process improvements. His expertise spans ERP systems, big data solutions, and startup technology foundations, all while ensuring efficient, scalable, and secure solutions. Albert is known for his ability to balance strategic oversight with hands-on technical leadership, fostering team collaboration, and enhancing system maintainability.

item.title: Behraam Wahid
item.description: Technical Program Manager with 10+ years in the fintech and retail space. I help growth stage to large companies such as Mettle, OLX and Argos deliver key projects.

item.title: David Denton
item.description: Versatile, hands-on Engineering Lead, specialising in architecting Continually Delivered platforms (<15 min lead time) using heavy automation & shift-left methods, driving high team throughput and reductions in time-to-market. Extensive experience working on high visibility projects in a broad variety of industries, and building the teams to deliver them effectively.

item.title: Dmitry Kandalov
item.description: Dmitry has been programming since DOS times. He spent over 20 years working with the JVM languages and has been writing Kotlin since 2016.

item.title: Franck Rasolo
item.description: I am a hands-on software architect, engineer, mentor with well over two decades of delivering reliable, repeatable, observable infrastructure and software systems to end users like clockwork using engineering discipline, eXtreme Programming practices and much software automation.

item.title: Giovanni Asproni
item.description: Experienced professional with a track record of aligning technology strategy with business goals. Expert at leading and managing cross-functional teams. Well versed in designing and implementing complex software systems. Expert in Agile Development, and in modern Software Engineering practices.

item.title: Ivan Sanchez
item.description: Technical leader with over twenty years of experience in software development and team leadership. Expert in fostering collaboration and facilitating communication between cross-functional teams and stakeholders to deliver complex software systems. Hands-on expertise in modern software architecture, design, and implementation techniques.

item.title: James Richardson
item.description:
James delivers reliable software products on-time, time after time.

Across many business domains and scales - James works with diverse software and product teams to take ideas from concept to production, reliably and without drama.

item.title: Julie Camosseto
item.description: I help companies of all sizes optimise their processes, accelerate the delivery of innovative technology, and drive strategic transformation. By blending management methodologies and technical leadership, I create adaptable models that align with your organisationâ€™s unique needs.

item.title: Uberto Barbini
item.description: Uberto is a highly experienced software engineer, Kotlin Google Developer Expert (GDE), and passionate advocate for functional programming and distributed computing. With over 20 years of experience in designing and delivering successful software products across various industries, he has a strong focus on delivering continuous business value through automation, collaborative development, and pragmatic, test-driven solutions.
